review_data.content: this is what i so call a real authentic local bar, very friendly staff and next to a good club. in summer they have a good openair cinema program

review_data.title: One of my fovoirte bar in zurich, with lovely cheap food
review_data.content: The atmosphere here is something special, if you are alone, in couple or with friend you will feel good here. Nice wine with right prices, good beers and special food home made if you are hungry. Definitely a place to pass by and be sure...More

review_data.title: Meine Lieblingsbar im Sommer

review_data.title: One beer and a movie
review_data.content: On my first day in Zurich came here for small beer but stayed to watch Kubrick's Lolita - it was perfect! Nice place, nice prices, nice people.

review_data.title: A nice summer spot
review_data.content: This bar maybe small, but on a warm summer day/evening this whole square becomes a huge party central of music and merriment. There is a cinema next door that shows old movies, documentaries and children’s films. It also can be rented out for uses. There...More

review_data.title: DER Sommertipp

review_data.title: Summer hangout. No frills. Bring friends or tattoos.
review_data.content: Xenix is open in summer, and it's basically a large gravel plaza around some municipal building (presumably a school of some kind), with a bar on the side. Absolutely no frills, takeout booze and sit where you find a spot. On a warm summer evening...More

review_data.title: Great outdoor bar
review_data.content: On a nice, warm summer evening, the gravel square around Xenix becomes crowded with a hip, young-ish crowd. There's the Kanzlei club right next to it too. People sit outside at the tables or spread all around the area on benches, steps and the playground...More
